trans-unit.source: Delete a job from an account
trans-unit.target: Delete a job from an account

trans-unit.source: Deletes a job from the specified account.
trans-unit.target: Deletes a job from the specified account.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to jobs.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to jobs.

trans-unit.source: Replace {job-id} with the job that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {job-id} with the job that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>

trans-unit.source: Deleting a job also deletes all tasks that are part of that job, and all job statistics.
trans-unit.target: Deleting a job also deletes all tasks that are part of that job, and all job statistics.

trans-unit.source: This also overrides the retention period for task data; that is, if the job contains tasks which are still retained on compute nodes, the Batch services deletes those tasks’ working directories and all their contents.
trans-unit.target: This also overrides the retention period for task data; that is, if the job contains tasks which are still retained on compute nodes, the Batch services deletes those tasks’ working directories and all their contents.

trans-unit.source: When a Delete Job request is received, the Batch service sets the job to the deleting state.
trans-unit.target: When a Delete Job request is received, the Batch service sets the job to the deleting state.

trans-unit.source: All update operations on a job that is in <languageKeyword>deleting</languageKeyword> state will fail with status code 409 (Conflict), with additional information indicating that the job is being deleted.
trans-unit.target: All update operations on a job that is in <languageKeyword>deleting</languageKeyword> state will fail with status code 409 (Conflict), with additional information indicating that the job is being deleted.
